DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect colecalciferol substitution dialysis patient bone metabolism immune system
DOC.criteria: 1 . Serum 25OHVit.Dlevels < 60 ng/ml 2 . Age > 18 year 3. dialysis treatment > 3 Months 4. sign write informed consent 5 . SerumCalciumlevels < 2,6 mmol/l within last 4 week 6 . SerumPhosphatelevels < 7,0 mg/dl within last 4 week 7 . Ca x PProduct < 75 mg2/dl2 within last 4 week 1 . Serum 25OHVit.Dlevels > 60 ng/ml 2. concommitant participation another interventional trial 3. psychiatric disorder prevent valid informed consent 4 . Hyperphosphatemia ( > 7,0 mg/dl ) within last 4 week 5 . Hypercalcemia ( > 2,6 mmol/l ) within last 4 week 6 . Ca x PProduct > 75 mg2/dl2 within last 4 week 7. pregnancy lactation 8. know malignancy 9. liver disease , define 2fold upper limit ASAT , ALATlevels 10 . PTH level < 50 pg/ml 11. current clinically relevant infection treat antibiotic therapy raise hsCRP level 12 . Chronic viral Infectious disease ( e.g . HIV , Hepatitis B C ) 13 .
